name: Don't Poke Yellow Ball V.1.3
description:
Use arrow keys to control the shield(s) to help the yellow ball and make the annoying purple ball(s) go away.

UPDATE LOG

V1.0: Made base game with only one song that plays.

V1.1: Added music for every game mode.

V1.2: Made impossible and double ball mode.

V1.3: Made multitasker mode and now you can use WASD in all gamemodes except Multitasker mode.

All Music is from Splatoon 3 except the music that plays on Normal or Double Ball mode. The music that plays on normal mode is called Only You by Intense.

Made 100% by 100happee.
